------
= [[size 150%]]{{**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7345 SCP-7345]** - Important, Attention Stealing Title!}}[[/size]]
------
= //(Written by [[user TroutMaskReplica]] and drawn by [[user winkwonkboi]].)//
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
**__Artist's Commentary__**

Wow, it's been a minute since I actually drew something.

Since it has been a while, the drawing itself might look a little rough, but hey, I gave it my all for this one. If you look closely enough, you'll notice that I've outline each and every page in this digital artwork in the midspan of a few hours because I had nothing better to do apparently.

A fair few months has passed since my [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/wettle-appreciation-post last actual post] too but I have something prepared for GoblinCon, don't worry. Let's just hope I get to pull through with some more to show instead of simply writing up multiple drafts and finishing none of them.

With that said, I'll be heading off. See you when posting opens.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
+ //We Hear You!//
+++ Check out my other 'doodles' [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/winkwonk-doodles here.]
@@ @@
